page.title: 17PENSTOWE MANOR
page.content: Up to 1000 people can stay in the chalets in the grounds and the Manor can accomodate 20 people.Mrs Thynne was the owner of Penstowe Manor before she died in 1960.She did not have any children because her husband was killed in the great war.Mrs Thynnes' nephew came to look at the house but said it was too big for him and sold it. Nowadays, many people come to Penstowe for their holidays each year. There is a nice swimming pool,which the children of Kilkhampton school are allowed to use.There is also a shop and amusements building on the site,and a bar for the holidaymakers and local people { By Lindsay Spence
